content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I see you need plumbing help. May I have your name, please?
Thanks, Mike. Could you please provide your address so I can check if we cover your area?
Let me check your address to see if it's within our service area.

I'm sorry, Mike. It appears that 789 Pine Street, Rivertown is outside our service area. We wouldn't want to leave you stranded. Would you still like me to see if we can arrange a special service option or help you in another way?
Well, I really need the plumbing fixed soon. Can you make an exception or maybe someone from your network can help?
Thanks for explaining, Mike. Let me check if we have any related options or if we can refer you to a trusted partner near your location.
reason: Out of service area assistance request
